transArray.content: Very good. Very close to Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station.

Dear guest, hello, thank you for choosing Hanting! Our hotel is only 1.2 kilometers away from Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station. It is the nearest hotel nearby. It takes about a quarter of an hour to walk. The starting price of a taxi is very close. There is also a free parking lot in the hotel courtyard. The hotel also has a self-service laundry room and a drop-off service. The meal robot is very convenient and provides you with value-for-money service. We look forward to your visit again!
